channel.title: No matching sls found - updates via whonix
channel.description:
Hi,
I am following this guide: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Upgrading_Whonix_13_to_Whonix_14#Sanity_Tests
I am the last stage for qubes-whonix where I need to use this command to make all templateVMs upgrades routed through sys-whonix.
> sudo qubesctl state.sls qvm.updates-via-whonix
I am getting this error: - Data failed to compile:
No matching sls found for 'qvm.updates-via-whonix' in env 'base'
DOM0 configuration failed, not continuing
-
How do I solve this? Thanks in advance for the help!
Edit: I'm on Qubes 3.2

item.title: No matching sls found - updates via whonix
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.source: No matching sls found - updates via whonix

item.title: No matching sls found - updates via whonix
item.dc:creator: zerop
item.description:
Hi,

I am following this guide: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Upgrading_Whonix_13_to_Whonix_14#Sanity_Tests

I am the last stage for qubes-whonix where I need to use this command to make all templateVMs upgrades routed through sys-whonix.

sudo qubesctl state.sls qvm.updates-via-whonix

I am getting this error:

Data failed to compile:

No matching sls found for ‘qvm.updates-via-whonix’ in env ‘base’

DOM0 configuration failed, not continuing

How do I solve this? Thanks in advance for the help!

Edit: I’m on Qubes 3.2

Read full topic
